revised_title: Triatomic Ammonias: Research and Analysis of Diethylene-triamine and Triethylene-triamine
tldr: The author investigates the formation and properties of triatomic ammonias, specifically diethylene-triamine and triethylene-triamine. These bases are found to be powerful alkaline liquids, soluble in water and alcohol, and capable of forming various salts with different properties. The author also examines the platinum and gold salts of these triatomic ammonias.
